messages.subject: Earthmoon-who??
messages.msgSnippet: Wow, an acupuncturist. I take my dev. delay-hypotonic 4 yr old to a Naturopathic Chiro who does acupuncture. He mainly doens neuro points in the head w/o
messages.messageBody:
Wow, an acupuncturist. I take my dev. delay-hypotonic 4 yr old to a
Naturopathic Chiro who does acupuncture. He mainly doens neuro points in
the head w/o hooking up. She does really well! I love it for myself
also. I get over my health issues faster :o) Do you have your own
practice? Pass me on any info you have that could help or site you know
of. I'm kind of the only one who does the natrual way w/ my special need
child but I have lots of friends who later in life try it but, by then,
the problem patterns are set & harder to treat. But I don't need to tell
you that LOL

KIDS4GOD Learning Co.
~\o/~\o/~\o/~\o/~
Jolene Goens
"Heal me, O Lord, And I shall be healed..." Jer 17:14

On Wed, 10 May 2000 11:40:17 -0700 Earth Moon
<earthmoonwater@...> writes:
> At 12:56 PM 8/9/00 -0700, you wrote:
> >Tamie,
> >They say acupuncture & magnet therapy(both in ears ,I think) work
> great
> >for this . I do both but don't smoke so I can't say for sure. If
> your're
> >interested, I'll email you the sites I have.
> >
> >KIDS4GOD Learning Co.
> > ~\o/~\o/~\o/~\o/~
> > Jolene Goens
> >"Heal me, O Lord, And I shall be healed..." Jer 17:14
>
> I'm an acupuncturist - and yes, these really do reduce the cravings
> as long
> as you're using all of your other resources too, that is, JUST
> needles/
> magnets in ears won't make you stop :)
>
>
> earthmoon, the spirited 3yo pooter and little bean due in Jan

> What did people do before diapers? what we're doing now :) Come
> check out
> my Elimination Communication e-list
> : http://www.egroups.com/group/eliminationcommunication
> We live in a society that is rapidly becoming a nation of
> sociopaths. The
> root cause of this is not the loss of family values. Neither is it
> the

> disturbed individuals. The cause, instead, is the conventional, but
